ComicInfo.Summary: A gypsy cannot read the palms of a man with two hooks in place of hands.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 15:24:22. [CVDB146269] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 22:40:29. [Issue ID 250681]

ComicInfo.Title: Unhappy Meals Featuring Teenie Meanie Babies; A Stork's Tale; Signs Your Folks Hate Your Guts!; Aycaramba; Dog's Best Friend; If Hercules Had Been Born in America; Sandy Shortt's Rules of Beach Volleyball; A Cracked Look at Soccer Moms; Tanks, But No Tanks; The Worst Real-Life TV Show Producer; The Cracked Guide to Beanie Babies; Mother Goosebumps; Leech Lake Camp; Cracked Visits a Modern Hospital; A Gypsy's Tale; Barfman & Slobbin'
